summary: Build a web page/app for learning languages using AI.

existing_features.title: Create a language-learning single-page web app with core navigation and screens: Home/Dashboard, Practice, Vocabulary, and Settings.
Implement Internet Identity sign-in and show a signed-in experience that personalizes the app (e.g., shows the active learning language and progress).
Build a Vocabulary feature that lets users add, edit, and delete vocabulary entries (word/phrase, translation, optional notes, tags), and view them in a searchable/filterable list.

Create a Practice flow that generates short exercises from the user’s vocabulary and provides immediate feedback. Include at least: (1) translation (prompt -> answer), and (2) fill-in-the-blank from a template sentence.

Implement an AI-inspired “Tutor” feedback panel that explains mistakes using deterministic heuristics (e.g., normalization, typo tolerance, simple grammar/word-order hints) without calling any external LLM or third-party AI APIs.
Add a Progress/Dashboard view showing daily practice count, accuracy, and a simple review queue size (items due based on lastSeen and performance).

Apply one coherent, creative visual theme across the app (colors, typography, components) suitable for a language-learning product, avoiding blue/purple as the primary palette unless explicitly requested later.
Add generated static visual assets (logo + hero illustration) and render them in the app (e.g., on the Home/Dashboard and/or sign-in screen) from frontend/public/assets/generated.
Add a new Conversation Practice mode that lets authenticated users practice short, turn-based text conversations using deterministic (non-LLM) logic and the user’s existing vocabulary.
Expose Conversation Practice in the app navigation and dashboard so users can easily discover and start it.

Provide per-turn “AI Tutor” feedback for conversation replies using the existing deterministic tutor heuristics (normalization + typo tolerance), and record the turn outcome against the relevant vocabulary item using the existing practice-result submission flow.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an AI-powered language learning web page/app.

Add backend data models and persistence for user learning state: active source/target languages, vocabulary items, per-item stats (e.g., correct/incorrect counts, lastSeen), and overall practice history.
Add an AI-driven conversation practice mode (chat-based speaking/writing practice) for language learners.

projectName: AI-inspired language learning web app (Tutor, exercises, progress)
